ResponseRateQAT.title: t(1. Response rate or cooperation rate)

CovariatesAndConfoundingFactorsQAT.title: t(2. Covariates and confounding factors)
enum: Yes, all identified covariates and confounding factors are assessed
Yes, some of the identified covariates and confounding factors are assessed

ConfirmedDiagnosisQAT.title: t(3. Confirmed diagnosis)
enum: Yes, method used for confirming diagnosis
No, a non-validated self-report diagnosis was used

PercentageOfMissingDataExposureQAT.title: t(4.1 Percentage of missing data for the main exposure)

PercentageOfMissingDataOutcomeQAT.title: t(4.2 Percentage of missing data for the main outcome)

RepresentativeSampleQAT.title: t(7. Representative sample)
enum: Yes: representative sample for the study population
No, a non-representative sample was taken

IncidenceQAT.title: t(8. Incidence)
enum: Yes, cases reported as incident cases
No, cases not reported as incident cases

ControlsQAT.title: t(9. Controls)
enum: Controls are from the same population as cases
Controls are from similar population as cases
Controls are from another population or national controls

TypeOfAdministrationQAT.title: t(1. Type of administration)
enum: Self-administered and not verified by interviewer
Interview administered using automated multiple-pass method

ContentValidityOfQuestionnaireAssessedQA.title: t(3. Content validity of questionnaire assessed (if 2 = Self-developed questionnaires))
enum: Yes, in a comparable population in terms of both age and dietary habits

ReferenceOfTheValidationQAT.title: t(4. Reference of the validation (if 3 = Yes))
enum: Comparison with subjective dietary assessment methods (e.g., FFQ, 24-h recall, or short term dietary record)
Comparison with long-term weighted dietary record (>7 d)
Comparison with objective methods (e.g., biomarker of dietary intake)

ValidatedElementsQAT.title: t(5. Validated elements (if 3 = Yes))
enum: Properties of the whole questionnaire (e.g. interrater reliability, etc.)
Frequency options appropriate to identify between-person variations
Food items lead to underestimated target nutrients intake (for FFQ only)

QuantificationOfPortionSizesQAT.title: t(8. Quantification of portion sizes)
enum: Standard portion sizes with aids such as pictures, models, standard household measure, utensils, etc.
Portion sizes are assessed digitally but not verified by trained staff
Portion sizes are assessed digitally and verified by trained staff (or packaging)

DescriptionOfFoodIntakeDataQAT.title: t(9. Description of food intake data (if 8 ¡Ù not quantified))
enum: Food intake is directly expressed into units of weights or volume (for weighed Food record)
Food intake is converted from estimated portion sizes into units of weights or volume

GeographicallySpecificFoodCompositionDat.title: t(10. Geographically specific food composition data (if 8 ¡Ù not quantified))

MatchingData1QAT.title: t(11.1 Matching consumed food to referred food composition data, exact matching (%, if 8 ¡Ù not quantified))

MatchingData2QAT.title: t(11.2 Food items matched to means of min.3 food items in the table (%, if 8 ¡Ù not quantified))

MatchingData3QAT.title: t(11.3 Food items matched to same food items in the table with similar moisture content (%, if 8 ¡Ù not quantified))

MatchingData4QAT.title: t(11.4 Food items matched to a different food (%, if 8 ¡Ù not quantified))

RepresentativenessWeekDaysQAT.title: t(12. Representativeness of the week/weekend days)

NumberOfDaysOfRecallQAT.title: t(13. Number of days of the recall/measurement per individual)

TheTimeOfDietRecordsQAT.title: t(15. The time of diet records)
enum: Not during eating occasions or immediately after

CustomizedFoodQAT.title: t(16. Customized food quantification method based on characters of population groups)
enum: The method was tailored to the characteristics of the population assessed
The method was not specifically tailored to the characteristics of the population assessed

trainingOfAssessorsQAT.title: t(Training of assessors)
enum: Self-reported, without assessors or with assessors not trained using standard operating procedures
Trained, not using standard operating procedures
Trained and using predefined standard operating procedures

WeightQAT.title: t(Weight)
enum: Measured with no clothing instructions by an assessor
Measured naked or with only light clothing by an assessor

WaistCircumferenceQAT.title: t(Waist circumference)
enum: Measured naked or with only light clothing

BMIQAT.title: t(BMI status (categories))
enum: Measured naked or with only light clothing
Measured using objective measures (weight and height, body scanner...)
